name: UIContentInsetsReference
desc: Constants that describe the reference point of the content insets.

items.name: case automatic
items.desc: Content insets use the system default reference point.

items.name: case none
items.desc: Content insets do not have a reference point in relation to other insets.

items.name: case safeArea
items.desc: Content insets use a reference point in relation to the safe area.

items.name: case layoutMargins
items.desc: Content insets use a reference point in relation to the layout margins.

items.name: case readableContent
items.desc: Content insets use a reference point in relation to the readable content guide.
